turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi. how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. i can set that up for you. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need three large pizzas, one sausage, one cheese, one pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of crust did you want on those?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me read the order back to you to make sure i got it down correctly. you want 3 large pizzas all with stuffed crust, 1 sausage, 1 cheese, and 1 pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the cheese pizza, can you make an extra cheese?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: u want 3 large pizzas all with stuffed crust, 1 sausage, 1 cheese with extra cheese, and 1 pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $69.02 is the total. should i charge the card on file now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've charged the card on file. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. good bye. you are welcome.
